_description: Human-in-the-loop configuration for Phase 0 OCR (Test Final). Define pages to ignore for each PDF to reduce OCR cost.
_usage: Set USE_HUNMAN_IN_LOOP=TRUE in .env to enable this configuration.

_format.total_pages: Total number of pages in the PDF (required if ignoring pages)
_format.ignore_pages: Array of page numbers (1-indexed) to skip during OCR
_format.notes: Optional notes about why pages are ignored
